```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
```

```{r}
megadata <- read_csv("megadata.csv")
```

```{r}
megadata %>%
  filter(Legislation == TRUE) %>%
  mutate(party = ifelse(claimant_party == "Republican", 
                        "Republican", 
                        "Democratic")) %>%
  count(party) %>%
  kable(caption = "Lies about Legislation by Party")
```
